cells.data:
# minishift installed via Homebrew (beta)
# gofabric8 client installed and put to PATH
# Open at least three terminals
# 1. for OpenShift interaction
# 2. for xPaaS images
# 3. for cloning the repository
# TODO -> use OSCP Image!
minishift start --cpus 2 --memory=8192
oc login -u system:admin
oc project default
oc adm policy add-cluster-role-to-user cluster-admin developer
# the entire zoo incl it's keeper
gofabric8 deploy -y
# Default GOGS admin username/password = gogsadmin/RedHat$1


# >>>Terminal 2<<< Get latest images
git clone https://github.com/openshift/openshift-ansible
# no cd!
oc create -f openshift-ansible/roles/openshift_examples/files/examples/v1.4/cfme-templates -n openshift || true
oc create -f openshift-ansible/roles/openshift_examples/files/examples/v1.4/db-templates -n openshift || true
oc create -f openshift-ansible/roles/openshift_examples/files/examples/v1.4/image-streams/image-streams-rhel7.json -n openshift || true
oc create -f openshift-ansible/roles/openshift_examples/files/examples/v1.4/quickstart-templates -n openshift || true
oc create -f openshift-ansible/roles/openshift_examples/files/examples/v1.4/xpaas-streams -n openshift || true
oc create -f openshift-ansible/roles/openshift_examples/files/examples/v1.4/xpaas-templates -n openshift || true
oc create -f openshift-ansible/roles/openshift_hosted_templates/files/v1.4/enterprise -n openshift || true
BASEURL=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jboss-fuse/application-templates/application-templates-2.0.redhat-000026 || true
oc replace --force -n openshift -f ${BASEURL}/fis-image-streams.json || true

# >>>Terminal 1<<<
gofabric8 service gogs
# in browser window create new mirror (local) from https://github.com/karstengresch/book-insultapp.git
# then clone from
